meanings.definition: A meeting in which participants communicate via telephone or video conferencing.
meanings.sent1: We had our weekly teleconferences to discuss the project.
meanings.sent2: Teleconferences have become a common way for teams to collaborate remotely.
meanings.sent3: During the teleconference, someone accidentally put their phone on mute and we couldn't hear them!
meanings.sent4: The teleconference was like a virtual round table where everyone shared their ideas.
meanings.sent5: The teleconference room was filled with voices from different locations, making it feel like a global gathering.

meanings.definition: To participate in a meeting via telephone or video conferencing.
meanings.sent1: I will teleconference with the client tomorrow to discuss the proposal.
meanings.sent2: She teleconferences with her team every morning to plan the day's tasks.
meanings.sent3: The CEO teleconferenced from a tropical island, making us all jealous of his remote work setup.
meanings.sent4: We teleconferenced with the overseas team, bridging the distance with technology.
meanings.sent5: Teleconferencing allows us to connect instantly, no matter where we are in the world.
